app.title: KamoMemo
app.message:
Looking into the Kamo,
maybe the Kamo also looks into you

term.title: Term od Use
term.message:
There is no particular restriction.
Please use it freely as long as the creator's firebase has no limited.

Please note that this service may be terminated without prior notice.
We appreciate your understanding.

placeholder: The first line becomes the title

howtouse.title: How to Use
howtouse.message2: You can be writing Markdown like this site.
howtouse.message3: If you write the markdown format on the left side (hereafter, input field), the result will be displayed on the right side (hereafter display field).
howtouse.message4:
You can save by shortcut while writing in the input field.
Windows：ctrl + s
Mac：command + s
howtouse.message5: It will be automatically saved when about 3 seconds pass since writing was finished.
howtouse.message13: If there are other unclear points, please contact the creator.
